title: Swap Saloni Singh and Sumit Shrivastav name labels in Our Team section

requirements.summary: Swap only the displayed name strings for the first two team cards in FoundersSection so the Sumit-photo card shows “Saloni Singh” and the Saloni-photo card shows “Sumit Shrivastav”, without changing photos, roles, or ordering.
acceptanceCriteria: The first (left-most) team card displays the name text exactly: “Saloni Singh”.
The second (middle) team card displays the name text exactly: “Sumit Shrivastav”.
The avatar images/photo IDs, fallbackImage paths, roles (e.g., “Co-founder”), and card ordering remain unchanged; only the displayed names are swapped.

file_operations.description: Update only the `name` fields in the first two entries of the `founders` array: set the first (currently tied to `sumitPhoto`/its fallbackImage) to exactly “Saloni Singh”, and set the second (currently tied to `saloniPhoto`/its fallbackImage) to exactly “Sumit Shrivastav”. Do not alter `photo`, `fallbackImage`, `role`, `initials`, or array ordering.
